page.title: 18A day in my life (1)
page.content: My{mom}calls me at{ten to seven,I}get up,open my{curtains,make my bed,get {washed}and{have my breakfast.I}get my {books and}hurry up my lazy{brother. {The clock}says{ten to nine, mom}drives us to{school, as}I get out, the{bell {goes, I'm just in time}for registration. After{registration, it's assembly {Mr.Eades}talks about the{war. We sing {El Shadai}and{Angels Watching Over Me. { Lessons start, Class 7}has {comprehension. I'm level 9 book 3, and I get{four house}points for my {English, this}makes{19}this{week. {Ring, ring}the{bell rings}for playtime, my friend falls out with my other friend. They carry on{arguing} all through{Maths.
